question: The Nile River is the longest river in the world.
Mount Everest is the highest mountain in South America.
Tokyo is the capital of Japan.
The Sahara Desert is located in Asia.
The Amazon Rainforest is primarily located in Brazil.
Australia is both a country and a continent.
The Great Barrier Reef is the largest coral reef system in the world.
The Prime Meridian runs through Greenwich, London.
The Panama Canal connects the Atlantic Ocean to the Indian Ocean.
The city of Istanbul is located in two continents: Europe and Asia.
